document_data.name: Konishi Seichi
document_data.mainbody: '''Konishi Seichi''' was a member of the [[ninja]] [[Konishi clan]] in [[Kozakura]] in [[1357 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Seichi lived in [[Dojyu]] as a [[wu jen]] named '''Kumorigawa Seichi''' with her father [[Konishi Ieyasu]]. She acted as main lieutenant of her father during the ninja missions. Seichi was one of the few to knew about the [[Iridescent Peacock Society]] even though she is not a member. Often she was away from Dojyu perfuming some ninja missions.
document_data.Personality: Seichi was authoritative and ruthless. Also she had a sadistic vein during interrogations.
